PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_BILLING_PROD_INST
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.41.804842000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2

,blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_prod_inst_qty IN NUMBER
,seasonal_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,seasonal_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

);

body.name: DA_BILLING_PROD_INST
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_BILLING_PROD_INST
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.41.819286000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,origin_bus_interact_item_id IN NUMBER
,billing_package_product_id IN NUMBER
,billing_package_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,billing_service_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_id IN NUMBER
,product_offering_id IN NUMBER
,billing_prod_inst_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_prod_inst_qty IN NUMBER
,seasonal_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,seasonal_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_prod_inst.add(fx), parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || origin_bus_interact_item_id || '|' || billing_package_product_id || '|' || billing_package_product_cd || '|' || billing_service_product_id || '|' || billing_service_product_cd || '|' || account_id || '|' || product_offering_id || '|' || billing_prod_inst_status_cd || '|' || blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm || '|' || billing_start_dttm || '|' || billing_prod_inst_qty || '|' || seasonal_start_dttm || '|' || seasonal_end_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_billing_prod_inst a
(
a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.billing_prod_inst_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.source_system_id
,a.origin_bus_interact_item_id
,a.billing_package_product_id
,a.billing_package_product_cd
,a.billing_service_product_id
,a.billing_service_product_cd
,a.account_id
,a.product_offering_id
,a.billing_prod_inst_status_cd
,a.blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm
,a.billing_start_dttm
,a.billing_prod_inst_qty
,a.seasonal_start_dttm
,a.seasonal_end_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
)
VALUES
(
NULL
,NULL
,chtr.s_billing_prod_inst_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.source_system_id
,add.origin_bus_interact_item_id
,add.billing_package_product_id
,add.billing_package_product_cd
,add.billing_service_product_id
,add.billing_service_product_cd
,add.account_id
,add.product_offering_id
,add.billing_prod_inst_status_cd
,add.blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm
,add.billing_start_dttm
,add.billing_prod_inst_qty
,add.seasonal_start_dttm
,add.seasonal_end_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
) RETURNING a.billing_prod_inst_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_prod_inst.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,origin_bus_interact_item_id IN NUMBER
,billing_package_product_id IN NUMBER
,billing_package_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,billing_service_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_id IN NUMBER
,product_offering_id IN NUMBER
,billing_prod_inst_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_prod_inst_qty IN NUMBER
,seasonal_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,seasonal_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_prod_inst.add, parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || origin_bus_interact_item_id || '|' || billing_package_product_id || '|' || billing_package_product_cd || '|' || billing_service_product_id || '|' || billing_service_product_cd || '|' || account_id || '|' || product_offering_id || '|' || billing_prod_inst_status_cd || '|' || blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm || '|' || billing_start_dttm || '|' || billing_prod_inst_qty || '|' || seasonal_start_dttm || '|' || seasonal_end_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_billing_prod_inst a
(
a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.billing_prod_inst_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.source_system_id
,a.origin_bus_interact_item_id
,a.billing_package_product_id
,a.billing_package_product_cd
,a.billing_service_product_id
,a.billing_service_product_cd
,a.account_id
,a.product_offering_id
,a.billing_prod_inst_status_cd
,a.blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm
,a.billing_start_dttm
,a.billing_prod_inst_qty
,a.seasonal_start_dttm
,a.seasonal_end_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
)
VALUES
(
NULL
,NULL
,chtr.s_billing_prod_inst_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.source_system_id
,add.origin_bus_interact_item_id
,add.billing_package_product_id
,add.billing_package_product_cd
,add.billing_service_product_id
,add.billing_service_product_cd
,add.account_id
,add.product_offering_id
,add.billing_prod_inst_status_cd
,add.blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm
,add.billing_start_dttm
,add.billing_prod_inst_qty
,add.seasonal_start_dttm
,add.seasonal_end_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_prod_inst.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,origin_bus_interact_item_id IN NUMBER
,billing_package_product_id IN NUMBER
,billing_package_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_service_product_id IN NUMBER
,billing_service_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_id IN NUMBER
,product_offering_id IN NUMBER
,billing_prod_inst_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_prod_inst_qty IN NUMBER
,seasonal_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,seasonal_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_prod_inst.add, parms=' || billing_prod_inst_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || origin_bus_interact_item_id || '|' || billing_package_product_id || '|' || billing_package_product_cd || '|' || billing_service_product_id || '|' || billing_service_product_cd || '|' || account_id || '|' || product_offering_id || '|' || billing_prod_inst_status_cd || '|' || blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm || '|' || billing_start_dttm || '|' || billing_prod_inst_qty || '|' || seasonal_start_dttm || '|' || seasonal_end_dttm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_billing_prod_inst a
(
a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.billing_prod_inst_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.source_system_id
,a.origin_bus_interact_item_id
,a.billing_package_product_id
,a.billing_package_product_cd
,a.billing_service_product_id
,a.billing_service_product_cd
,a.account_id
,a.product_offering_id
,a.billing_prod_inst_status_cd
,a.blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm
,a.billing_start_dttm
,a.billing_prod_inst_qty
,a.seasonal_start_dttm
,a.seasonal_end_dttm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
)
VALUES
(
NULL
,NULL
,add.billing_prod_inst_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.source_system_id
,add.origin_bus_interact_item_id
,add.billing_package_product_id
,add.billing_package_product_cd
,add.billing_service_product_id
,add.billing_service_product_cd
,add.account_id
,add.product_offering_id
,add.billing_prod_inst_status_cd
,add.blg_prod_inst_vld_st_dttm
,add.billing_start_dttm
,add.billing_prod_inst_qty
,add.seasonal_start_dttm
,add.seasonal_end_dttm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_prod_inst.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_prod_inst.del, parms=' || billing_prod_inst_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_billing_prod_inst a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.billing_prod_inst_id = del.billing_prod_inst_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_prod_inst.del');

END del;

END da_billing_prod_inst;
